From: "Richard Turner" <ikkanshi@...>

Subject: [nihontostudy] Izumi no Kami kanesada
Date: Tue, 29 Apr 2003 15:24:36 +0800


Greetings all, I am looking into a sword signed Izumi no Kami Kanesada saku
I believe to be from the late Shinshinto era. I can find reference to the
11th gen Kanesada and the (last) 13th gen Kanesada but nothing on the 12th
Gen. does anyone have any info or can point me to a resource please. 
regards 

Rich T
